A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I don't care how much these so called "Critics" are getting paid to say this is a good movie. This is the WORST Star Wars movie ever! Bar None. Littered with plot holes and bad writing the whole way. If your looking for a Star Wars parody or how to ruin a franchise and all its deep lore in one movie let me introduce you to 

Star Wars THE LAST JEDI.
